sentence.text: Additional validation efforts and functional studies are warranted to demonstrate whether negative regulation of translational initiation is a novel tumor suppressor gene and a potential therapeutic target for pancreatic cancer

In a two-stage study, we analyzed the existing genome-wide association study dataset of 868 pancreatic cancer patients from MD Anderson Cancer Center in relation to overall survival using generation of precursor metabolites and energy regression.

entity.text: generation of precursor metabolites and energy
